data.eml:eml: NDFF Lichens on church walls and cemeteries

Over 250 systematic inventories have been made of lichens on church walls and surrounding cemeteries since 1999. Data sets are considered for this protocol when the following conditions are met:The data is provided to the NDFF per visit, and include the location name and coordinates accurate to a hundred meters.The substrate is indicated with each observation.This primarily applies to lichens.Dataset available via https://www.ndff.nl/english / serviceteamndff@natuurloket.nlPositive observations without zeros.13,029 records (March 2018)Dutch information on protocol:https://www.ndff.nl/overdendff/validatie/protocollen/2-001-korstmossen-op-kerkmuren-en-begraafplaatsen/
